creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
description: image of a winged elf with a large nose and pointed ears, wearing a cap with a pompon, long neck scarf and very long shoes, seated on a bare branch; text at bottom (in reverse):  "MERRY CHRISTMAS / THE HOLZSCHUHS"
object_name: Printing plate for Christmas card with image of winged elf
provenance: The artist; his stepdaughter, Joanie Nelson, Vancouver, WA
title: Printing plate for Christmas card with image of winged elf
